channel.title: Crunch for Insights Teams on Online survey data analysis
channel.description: Recent content in Crunch for Insights Teams on Online survey data analysis

item.title: All your data in one place
item.description: Stop scavenging for SPSS files and spreadsheets. Easily collaborate with your whole team. Instantly search across all your projects.

item.title: Automated data imports
item.description: Crunch’s automated import process makes your data ready for analysis:

item.title: Incredibly easy self-service
item.description: Don’t wait 2 days for new cuts from vendors Easily slice, dice, and filter respondent-level data anytime you want Answer your own questions and find insights faster. Create and apply a new filter in seconds e.g. 18-25 year olds, female, purchased your brand in last 6 months Easily deliver to your stakeholders Online: Interactive or static no-coding dashboards built in minutes. Offline: PowerPoint and Excel exports
